original_title: Emilie Richards - Das Paradies am Ende der Welt
overview: Julia Whitman and her daughter Jody flee their husband and fatherâ€™s violence to a doomsday paradise. Julia meets Matthey Haley in New Zealand and falls in love despite her inner resistance. However, the shadows of the past will not let you forget. Julia's ex-husband, Charles, who follows in the footsteps of his wife and daughter, shows up on the island.
title: Emilie Richards - Das Paradies am Ende der Welt
